datasets.name: Global Harmonized Urban Definition (GloPPRUA)
datasets.description: A comprehensive global dataset for harmonized urban area definition and population analysis. Provides consistent urban definitions across countries for comparative urban research.

datasets.name: Global Ghost City Index (GloGCI)
datasets.description: A global-scale dataset for identifying and analyzing ghost cities based on urban vitality metrics. Includes multi-source data integration for measuring urban activity patterns.

datasets.name: China's Multi-Attribute Building Dataset (CMAB)
datasets.description: A comprehensive multi-attribute building dataset for China, published in Scientific Data (ESI Highly Cited Paper). Contains detailed building footprints and attributes across Chinese cities.

datasets.name: Generative AI Benchmarks for Urban Science (AI4US)
datasets.description: Benchmark datasets for evaluating generative AI models in urban science applications. Designed to test AI performance on various urban analytical tasks.
